ygData.msgSnippet: Is this going to be an online game or a single player? Will it come out for Xbox? (which rulez PS2 :) BTW hey I am new to the group Kessan 35 Warrior on Rodcet
ygData.messageBody:
Re: [EverQuest] Playstation Is this going to be an online game or a single player? Will it come out for Xbox? (which rulez PS2 :)
BTW hey I am new to the group

Kessan
35 Warrior on Rodcet Nife

On 5/6/02 2:19 AM, "Thomas H. Comegys" <tcomegys@...> wrote:

Yes, but it won't be exactly the same game as the PC game. It will take
place in a Norrath 500 years earlier (I think, or maybe 500 years later)
than the Norrath we play in.
